/* USE : TodayDtlMapper.getPayColList */
SELECT tcn.NMCODE_CD AS PAY_CD, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS PAY_NM, tcn.NMCODE_ITEM_1 AS PAY_METHOD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '024' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD NOT IN ('05', '12') /* 쿠폰은 결제수단이 아닌 할인내역으로 들어가므로 하드코딩으로 결제수단에 나오지 않도록 함. */ ORDER BY tcn.NMCODE_CD

/* USE : TodayDtlMapper.getDcColList */
SELECT tcn.NMCODE_CD AS DC_CD, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS DC_NM, tcn.NMCODE_ITEM_1 AS DC_METHOD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '041' ORDER BY tcn.NMCODE_CD

/* USE : TodayDtlMapper.getGuestColList */
SELECT thn.NMCODE_CD AS GUEST_CD, thn.NMCODE_NM AS GUEST_NM FROM TB_HQ_NMCODE thn WHERE thn.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '102' ORDER BY thn.NMCODE_CD
